oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-03-01 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 1, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer), guest performer Floyd Tillman, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 960th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Floyd Tillman; Del Wood; Marty Robbins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Marty Robbins introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert commercial (June Carter, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Marty Robbins introduces Floyd Tillman -- Slippin' Around (Floyd Tillman) -- Marty Robbins introduces Del Wood -- Twelfth Street Rag (Del Wood) -- Marty Robbins and Grant Turner talk -- The Story Of My Life (Marty Robbins) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Marty Robbins) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner) -- Noel Hotel commercial (Grant Turner) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Robbins, Marty; Tillman, Floyd
